data.text: A momentary gust of wind reveals something of an unusual color partially buried beneath one of the nearby dunes.
You hasten over to investigate before the sand can cover it again, discovering a heavy metal trapdoor scoured by age and dust. Where could this possibly lead?

With a few minutes of work, you manage to clear enough sand to heave the thing open. It opens into a shaft made of a heavy black metal, descending deep into darkness. A painted ladder clings to one side, though the paint has chipped away with age. Cool, dry air rises from the depths. What have you uncovered?
